alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bladen County through 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lisbon, or 10 miles southeast of Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rowan, Carvers, Lagoon, Lisbon, Council and White Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
